Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%cl_extras Extras Optional extra info in JSON format that the clipboard may contains</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%cl_html_text HTML Text Current clipboard text if set as HTML text</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2>%cl_image_uri Image URI If the URI corresponds to an image, this will have a value</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3>%cl_mimetypes() Mime Type The types of data that the clipboard contains</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4>%cl_text Text Current clipboard text</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5>%cl_uri URI Current clipboard URI (could be image or something else)</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5></StringArray>

Share.d:
v2.6.0
by WehZet

A Simple Clipboard Manager using List Dialogs.
Stores the clipboard texts in a SQlite database
The number of stored entries can be chosen at the import (project variable) and in a separate task (included).
Single Entries can saved in an extra table of the databas, so they will not be overwritten if the clipborad array is full.

Put the task "Clipboard Manager" into your Quick Settings and use the Clipboard Manager everywhere you want.


RELEASES:

v2.6.0
31.05.2023

1) added a prompt which ask if you like to open in YouTube if the new clipboard content is a YouTube link. (original code from "konieckropka")

v2.5.2
07.03.2023

1) fixed problem where an error occurs at writing the new Clipboard content into SQL database when the Clip contains a ' (single quote)

v2.5.1
18.02.2023

1) optimized the parsing/formatting of the date for the "Save or Delete Entry" dialog

v2.5.0
16.02.2023

1) now showing within the "Save or Delete Entry" dialog the date and time when the chosen entry was saved and the short preview of the entry

v2.4.4
03.02.2023

1) fixed issue where the Clipboard Manager was cancelled in some situations

v2.4.3
>

1) fixed issue where not coming back to Clipboard Manager after deleting an entry

v2.4.2
02.02.2023

1) fixed issue where inserted text was cut off after a closing bracket ")"

v2.4.1
02.02.2023

1) corrected the perform task action in the initial task to the correct task (CBM Set Up Quick Setting Tile)

v2.4
02.02.2023

1) added a task to setup the Quick Setting Tile, also added this in to the initial task
2) long-tap the Quick Setting Tile will know instantly open the Join Bubble with the current clipboard content

v2.3

1) added "Join Send Push --> Clipboard Bubble" when clipboard changes
Since Android 13 the Logcat Entry Event no longer works pleasant without Root or ADB Wifi, so also the automatic snyc to your devices via Join does not work. Also Join uses this clipboard monitoring which no longer works. So I included the Join Clipboard Bubble to open when the clipboard changes.
This Clipbard Manager also uses the "Clipboard Changed" Event which uses Logcat. So Root or ADB Wifi is needed!

v2.2

1) new long-click option: "Send with Join Bubble" If Join is installed, the Join Bubble appears to send the chosen entry to your devices
2) corrected some labels

v2.1

1) corrected an error where it was not possible to single-delete an entry from Saved Manager

v2.0

1) changed storing entries from arrays to SQLite database
- auto delete duplicate entries
- limit logged Clipboard entries, changeable with "CBM Change Limit" task.
- Multi-Delete option
- showing only the first 100 characters in list dialogs to keep track.
2) reworked Long-Click options:
- "Paste, Add to Saved, Delete, Multi-Delete" for Clipboard Manager entries
- "Paste, Delete, Multi-Delete" for saved entries

v1.1

1) implemented a workaround for texts with "enter"
If the copied texts contains an "enter" it was stored in the temporary Clipboard Manager but it was not possible to paste or delete it. By saving this text only the first row was saved.
Workaround: Save text with #br# instead of "enter", but the text will be pasted with "enter" again! 12) changed from AutoInput to Keyboard-Action"

ProfileVariable.pvd: Choose how many entries the Clipboard Manager should log. You can change this value later with the "CBM Change Limit" task.

Action.label: Create file and tables if not exists
Create table "clipboardmanager" if not exists
Create table "savedmanager" if not exists
Create trigger in "clipboardmanager" for max. xxx entries
Action.Str: CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS limit_cbm_entries AFTER INSERT ON clipboardmanager BEGIN DELETE FROM clipboardmanager WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM clipboardmanager LIMIT 1) AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clipboardmanager)=%limit; END;
CBM Set up Quick Setting Tile

Action.label: replace ' (single quote) with '' (double quote). Single quote will cause an error at SQL Query
Insert new clip into table "clipboardmanager"
Delete duplicate in clipboardmanager
If the new clipboard content is a YouTube link, start this task to ask if to open in YouTube app.
If the dialog is cancelled by botton, clicking BACK or clicking beside the dialog the Task will be cancelled.
If clicking the "Clear Saved" Button all saved entries will be deleted, after a yes/no dialog.
If normal click on an entry it will fill the focused input dialog.

Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%kb_text_selected Selected Text Text selected on the current input, if any</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%kb_text Text Text present on the current input, if any</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2>%kb_text_after_cursor Text After Cursor Text after the cursor on the current input, if any</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3>%kb_text_before_cursor Text Before Cursor Text before the cursor on the current input, if any</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3></StringArray>

Action.label: If long click on an entry, show dialog to choose save or delete.
Read full data from table "savedmanager" in descent order

Action.label: Read short data from database table "savedmanager" in descent order to show the newest entry on top and the oldes entry on bottom of the list. Only the first 100 characters of the entry will be shown, to keep track.
If there is no entry in the Saved Entries.

Clipboard Manager


v2.6.0
by WehZet

This Clipboard Manager uses the "Clipboard Changed" Event which uses Logcat. Since Android 13 Logcat does not work without Root or ADB Wifi pleasant anymore. So Root or ADB Wifi is needed!

More info here:
https://tasker.joaoapps.com/knownissues.html

Hope you like it!
Any problems with this Clipboard Manager? Contact me on Reddit: u/WehZet

ideas

- pictures in Clipboard? Copy to folder...

v2.4
02.02.2023

1) added a task to setup the Quick Setting Tile, also added this in to the initial task

2) long-tap the Quick Setting Tile will know instantly open the Join Bubble with the current clipboard content

v2.3

1) added "Join Send Push --> Clipboard Bubble" when clipboard changes
Since Android 13 the Logcat Entry Event no longer works pleasant without Root or ADB Wifi, so also the automatic snyc to your devices via Join does not work. Also Join uses this clipboard monitoring which no longer works. So I included the Join Clipboard Bubble to open when the clipboard changes.
This Clipbard Manager also uses the "Clipboard Changed" Event which uses Logcat. So Root or ADB Wifi is needed!

v2.2

1) new long-click option: "Send with Join Bubble" If Join is installed, the Join Bubble appears to send the chosen entry to your devices
2) corrected some labels

v2.1

1) corrected an error where it was not possible to single-delete an entry from Saved Manager

v2.0

1) changed storing entries from arrays to SQLite database
- auto delete duplicate entries
- limit logged Clipboard entries, changeable with "CBM Change Limit" task.
- Multi-Delete option
- showing only the first 100 characters in list dialogs to keep track.
2) reworked Long-Click options:
- "Paste, Add to Saved, Delete, Multi-Delete" for Clipboard Manager entries
- "Paste, Delete, Multi-Delete" for saved entries

v1.1

1) implemented a workaround for texts with "enter"
If the copied texts contains an "enter" it was stored in the temporary Clipboard Manager but it was not possible to paste or delete it. By saving this text only the first row was saved. Workaround: Save text with #br# instead of "enter", but the text will be pasted with "enter" again!
2) changed from AutoInput to Keyboard-Action

v2.6.0
31.05.2023

1) added a prompt which ask if you like to open in YouTube if the new clipboard content is a YouTube link. (original code from "konieckropka")

v2.5.2
07.03.2023

1) fixed problem where an error occurs at writing the new Clipboard content into SQL database when the Clip contains a ' (single quote)

v2.5.1
18.02.2023

1) optimized the parsing/formatting of the date for the "Save or Delete Entry" dialog

v2.5.0
16.02.2023

1) now showing within the "Save or Delete Entry" dialog the date and time when the chosen entry was saved and the short preview of the entry

v2.4.4
03.02.2023

1) fixed issue where the Clipboard Manager was cancelled in some situations

v2.4.3
03.02.2023

1) fixed issue where not coming back to Clipboard Manager after deleting an entry

v2.4.2
02.02.2023

1) fixed issue where inserted text was cut off after a closing bracket ")"

v2.4.1
02.02.2023

1) corrected the perform task action in the initial task to the correct task (CBM Set Up Quick Setting Tile)
Set several variables for "coming from CBD" and coming from Saved"
Action.Str: Clear Clipboard Manager Do you really want to clear all Clipboard entries? clipboardmanager Clipboard Manager entries cleared. Nothing cleared. Back to Clipboard Manager. Clipboard Manager
Clear Saved Entries Do you really want to clear all Saved entries? savedmanager All saved entries cleared. Back to Clipboard Manager. Nothing cleared. Back to saved entries. CBM Saved Entries

Action.label: Question if you really want to delete

Task.nme: CBM Set up Quick Setting Tile

<StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%input Input The text that was retrieved from the dialog</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0></StringArray>

Action.Str: YouTube App not opened. Copied link to clipboard.

Action.label:
Original Author of this Code: konieckropkaIf | v.0.1 | 2021-10-15
YouTube (or YouTube Vanced, VLC or any other app that can open YouTube videos) app is installed on the system, this profile opens video in YouTube app when clipboard is set to YouTube video URL.
If app is not installed it opens video in the browser.
Usage example: when you browse the web with your mobile browser and get a YouTube video linked on a webpage it opens inside the browser. You might prefer to open it in YouTube (Vanced) app. You can now just copy URL from the browser address bar and video will open auomtaically in the app.
This works with all YouTube URLs patterns:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v= 9ix7TUGVYIo&feature=featured https://www.youtube.com/watch?v= 9ix7TUGVYIo http://www.youtube.com/watch?v= 9ix7TUGVYIo //www.youtube.com/watch?v= 9ix7TUGVYIo www.youtube.com/watch?v= 9ix7TUGVYIo https://youtube.com/watch?v= 9ix7TUGVYIo http://youtube.com/watch?v= 9ix7TUGVYIo //youtube.com/watch?v= 9ix7TUGVYIo youtube.com/watch?v= 9ix7TUGVYIo
https://m.youtube.com/watch?v= 9ix7TUGVYIo http://m.youtube.com/watch?v= 9ix7TUGVYIo //m.youtube.com/watch?v= 9ix7TUGVYIo m.youtube.com/watch?v= 9ix7TUGVYIo
https://www.youtube.com/v/ 9ix7TUGVYIo?fs=1&hl=en_US http://www.youtube.com/v/ 9ix7TUGVYIo?fs=1&hl=en_US //www.youtube.com/v/ 9ix7TUGVYIo?fs=1&hl=en_US www.youtube.com/v/ 9ix7TUGVYIo?fs=1&hl=en_US youtube.com/v/ 9ix7TUGVYIo?fs=1&hl=en_US
https://www.youtube.com/embed/ 9ix7TUGVYIo?autoplay=1 https://www.youtube.com/embed/ 9ix7TUGVYIo http://www.youtube.com/embed/ 9ix7TUGVYIo //www.youtube.com/embed/ 9ix7TUGVYIo www.youtube.com/embed/ 9ix7TUGVYIo https://youtube.com/embed/ 9ix7TUGVYIo http://youtube.com/embed/ 9ix7TUGVYIo //youtube.com/embed/ 9ix7TUGVYIo youtube.com/embed/ 9ix7TUGVYIo
https://youtu.be/ 9ix7TUGVYIo?t=120 https://youtu.be/ 9ix7TUGVYIo http://youtu.be/ 9ix7TUGVYIo //youtu.be/ 9ix7TUGVYIo youtu.be/ 9ix7TUGVYIo

Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%input Input The text that was retrieved from the dialog</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0></StringArray>

Action.Str:
ATTENTION: Setting a new entry limit for the Clipboard Manager will delete all logged clips. The saved entries are not effected!
Do you really want to change the entry limit?

Action.label: Delete old trigger
Create new trigger in "clipboardmanager" for max. xxx entries
Action.Str: CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS limit_cbm_entries AFTER INSERT ON clipboardmanager BEGIN DELETE FROM clipboardmanager WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM clipboardmanager LIMIT 1) AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clipboardmanager)=%limit; END;

Action.label: Delete all data from table clipboardmanager
